name: party wise sales comparison
report_script:
# Define columns for the combined report
combined_columns = [
    {
        'fieldname': 'customer_name',
        'label': _('Customer Name'),
        'fieldtype': 'Data',
        'width': 150
    },
    {
        'fieldname': 'total_sales_amount',
        'label': _('Total Billing'),
        'fieldtype': 'Currency',
        'width': 150
    },
    {
        'fieldname': 'quantity_difference',
        'label': _('Quantity Difference'),
        'fieldtype': 'Float',
        'width': 150
    },
    {
        'fieldname': 'amount_difference',
        'label': _('Billing Difference'),
        'fieldtype': 'Currency',
        'width': 150
    },
     {
        'fieldname': 'jan_qty_diff',
        'label': _('January Quantity Difference'),
        'fieldtype': 'Float',
        'width': 150
    },
    {
        'fieldname': 'jan_amount_diff',
        'label': _('January Billing Difference'),
        'fieldtype': 'Currency',
        'width': 150
    },
    {
        'fieldname': 'feb_qty_diff',
        'label': _('February Quantity Difference'),
        'fieldtype': 'Float',
        'width': 150
    },
    {
        'fieldname': 'feb_amount_diff',
        'label': _('February Billing Difference'),
        'fieldtype': 'Currency',
        'width': 150
    },
     {
        'fieldname': 'march_qty_diff',
        'label': _('March Quantity Difference'),
        'fieldtype': 'Float',
        'width': 150
    },
    {
        'fieldname': 'march_amount_diff',
        'label': _('March Billing Difference'),
        'fieldtype': 'Currency',
        'width': 150
    },
     {
        'fieldname': 'april_qty_diff',
        'label': _('April Quantity Difference'),
        'fieldtype': 'Float',
        'width': 150
    },
    {
        'fieldname': 'april_amount_diff',
        'label': _('April Billing Difference'),
        'fieldtype': 'Currency',
        'width': 150
    },
     {
        'fieldname': 'may_qty_diff',
        'label': _('May Quantity Difference'),
        'fieldtype': 'Float',
        'width': 150
    },
    {
        'fieldname': 'may_amount_diff',
        'label': _('May Billing Difference'),
        'fieldtype': 'Currency',
        'width': 150
    },
    {
        'fieldname': 'june_qty_diff',
        'label': _('June Quantity Difference'),
        'fieldtype': 'Float',
        'width': 150
    },
    {
        'fieldname': 'june_amount_diff',
        'label': _('June Billing Difference'),
        'fieldtype': 'Currency',
        'width': 150
    },
    {
        'fieldname': 'july_qty_diff',
        'label': _('July Quantity Difference'),
        'fieldtype': 'Float',
        'width': 150
    },
    {
        'fieldname': 'july_amount_diff',
        'label': _('July Billing Difference'),
        'fieldtype': 'Currency',
        'width': 150
    },
    {
        'fieldname': 'august_qty_diff',
        'label': _('August Quantity Difference'),
        'fieldtype': 'Float',
        'width': 150
    },
    {
        'fieldname': 'august_amount_diff',
        'label': _('August Billing Difference'),
        'fieldtype': 'Currency',
        'width': 150
    },
    {
        'fieldname': 'september_qty_diff',
        'label': _('September Quantity Difference'),
        'fieldtype': 'Float',
        'width': 150
    },
    {
        'fieldname': 'september_amount_diff',
        'label': _('September Billing Difference'),
        'fieldtype': 'Currency',
        'width': 150
    },
    {
        'fieldname': 'octomber_qty_diff',
        'label': _('Octomber Quantity Difference'),
        'fieldtype': 'Float',
        'width': 150
    },
    {
        'fieldname': 'octomber_amount_diff',
        'label': _('Octomber Billing Difference'),
        'fieldtype': 'Currency',
        'width': 150
    },
    {
        'fieldname': 'november_qty_diff',
        'label': _('November Quantity Difference'),
        'fieldtype': 'Float',
        'width': 150
    },
    {
        'fieldname': 'november_amount_diff',
        'label': _('November Billing Difference'),
        'fieldtype': 'Currency',
        'width': 150
    },
    {
        'fieldname': 'december_qty_diff',
        'label': _('December Quantity Difference'),
        'fieldtype': 'Float',
        'width': 150
    },
    {
        'fieldname': 'december_amount_diff',
        'label': _('December Billing Difference'),
        'fieldtype': 'Currency',
        'width': 150
    },
    # Add similar columns for other months...
]

# Define filter values
combined_filters = {
    'from_date': '2023-01-01',
    'to_date': '2023-12-31'
}

combined_mysql = """
SELECT
    customer_name,
    MAX(CASE WHEN invoice_month = 1 THEN quantity_difference END) AS jan_qty_diff,
    MAX(CASE WHEN invoice_month = 1 THEN amount_difference END) AS jan_amount_diff,
    MAX(CASE WHEN invoice_month = 2 THEN quantity_difference END) AS feb_qty_diff,
    MAX(CASE WHEN invoice_month = 2 THEN amount_difference END) AS feb_amount_diff,
    MAX(CASE WHEN invoice_month = 3 THEN quantity_difference END) AS march_qty_diff,
    MAX(CASE WHEN invoice_month = 3 THEN amount_difference END) AS march_amount_diff,
    MAX(CASE WHEN invoice_month = 4 THEN quantity_difference END) AS april_qty_diff,
    MAX(CASE WHEN invoice_month = 4 THEN amount_difference END) AS april_amount_diff,
    MAX(CASE WHEN invoice_month = 5 THEN quantity_difference END) AS may_qty_diff,
    MAX(CASE WHEN invoice_month = 5 THEN amount_difference END) AS may_amount_diff,
    MAX(CASE WHEN invoice_month = 6 THEN quantity_difference END) AS june_qty_diff,
    MAX(CASE WHEN invoice_month = 6 THEN amount_difference END) AS june_amount_diff,
    MAX(CASE WHEN invoice_month = 7 THEN quantity_difference END) AS july_qty_diff,
    MAX(CASE WHEN invoice_month = 7 THEN amount_difference END) AS july_amount_diff,
    MAX(CASE WHEN invoice_month = 8 THEN quantity_difference END) AS august_qty_diff,
    MAX(CASE WHEN invoice_month = 8 THEN amount_difference END) AS august_amount_diff,
    MAX(CASE WHEN invoice_month = 9 THEN quantity_difference END) AS september_qty_diff,
    MAX(CASE WHEN invoice_month = 9 THEN amount_difference END) AS september_amount_diff,
    MAX(CASE WHEN invoice_month = 10 THEN quantity_difference END) AS octomber_qty_diff,
    MAX(CASE WHEN invoice_month = 10 THEN amount_difference END) AS octomber_amount_diff,
    MAX(CASE WHEN invoice_month = 11 THEN quantity_difference END) AS november_qty_diff,
    MAX(CASE WHEN invoice_month = 11 THEN amount_difference END) AS november_amount_diff,
    MAX(CASE WHEN invoice_month = 12 THEN quantity_difference END) AS december_qty_diff,
    MAX(CASE WHEN invoice_month = 12 THEN amount_difference END) AS december_amount_diff,
  
    MAX(total_sales_amount) AS total_sales_amount,
    MAX(quantity_difference) AS quantity_difference,
    MAX(amount_difference) AS amount_difference
FROM (
    SELECT
        si.customer_name,
        MONTH(si.posting_date) AS invoice_month,
        SUM(sii.amount) AS total_sales_amount,
        sii.uom,
        SUM(sii.qty) AS qty,
        SUM(sii.qty) - LAG(SUM(sii.qty)) OVER (PARTITION BY si.customer_name, sii.uom ORDER BY MONTH(si.posting_date)) AS quantity_difference,
        SUM(sii.amount) - LAG(SUM(sii.amount)) OVER (PARTITION BY si.customer_name, sii.uom ORDER BY MONTH(si.posting_date)) AS amount_difference,
        SUM(sii.qty) - LAG(SUM(sii.qty)) OVER (PARTITION BY si.customer_name, sii.uom ORDER BY MONTH(si.posting_date)) AS qty_diff,
        SUM(sii.amount) - LAG(SUM(sii.amount)) OVER (PARTITION BY si.customer_name, sii.uom ORDER BY MONTH(si.posting_date)) AS amount_diff
    FROM
        `tabSales Invoice` si
        INNER JOIN `tabSales Invoice Item` sii ON si.name = sii.parent
    WHERE
        si.posting_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
    GROUP BY
        si.customer_name, invoice_month, sii.uom
) AS subquery
GROUP BY
    customer_name;
"""

combined_data = frappe.db.sql(combined_mysql, combined_filters, as_dict=True)

# Set the combined report data
data = (combined_columns, combined_data, "CombinedReport", None, None)
